Gov: Scott Walker pushed off some payments on the state's debt further into the future to balance his first state budget for 2011-2013.
State Sen: Kathleen Vinehout contends that general fund tax dollars are being used to make debt payments at the highest rate in state history in the 2013-2015 budget.
Vinehout criticizes the amount of borrow: claiming that more money is going towards debt payments than ever before.
Milwaukee Mayor Tom Barrett also critici: stating that he pushed over $500 million in debt onto future generations to balance the 2011-2013 state budget.
